urls.title: Dr. Oz Says He 'Misspoke' When He Suggested Kids Go Back to School amid Coronavirus Outbreak
urls.description: "I just saw a nice piece in The Lancet arguing that the opening of schools may only cost us two or three percent in terms of total mortality," Dr. Mehmet Oz said on Fox News

text:
@DrOz OMG is that a "sorry - but not sorry" comment?  UGH - send your grandchildren first for the next 60 days and let's see how it goes, and the children/grandchildren of the folks in government that support this idea...
https://t.co/4UoNyF2U0R #MissSpokeMyAss #TrumpVirus #Covid_19
